subject: Re: Axiom - Progress Update
preview: Hi Reinhard, Confirming the last of those changes have now been updated as well.

full_threads.body:
Hi Reinhard, 

Confirming the last of those changes have now been updated as well.

Hi Reinhard, 

Sure, no problems, just an update we have made all the changes except the Thrive index indicators. We should have those done in the next 30mins. I'll send you a followup once it's ready.

Hi Heath

The client had a quick look and found the following issues added to the document:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1r_elSgRN8PqI6mKVOoja7Hl1BFdzq6kiARoCZ9ToWJA/edit#gid=1387737711

Please can you have a look at these. The client will be doing a formal review this evening.

Thanks

Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406
Brand chemistry

brandchemistry.com.au

Hi Reinhard, 

Ok sure, we have updated those elements now too: https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/our-process/
@heath All good now on this one.

Hi Heath

Thanks for this. There are a few issues I can see on this page, please see below. Once these are fixed I can send this to the client:

Please fix the gap and order of the list items.



All sub headings to read "Benefits include:".



Please make sure CTA button is linked as per current website




Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406
Brand chemistry

brandchemistry.com.au

Hi Reinhard, 

Confirming we have made the updates to the Our process page, here is the link: https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/our-process/

@heath Cool, I have updated the our process page. 

https://staging-axiom.kinsta.cloud/our-process/

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

action.text: Heath Maguire changed the customer to Reinhard Kirchner

full_threads.body:
Hey Reinhard,

Thanks for the update - no problems, I have scheduled this in for the morning. We too are keen to get it live for you guys.

I'll be in touch with an update.

Have a good night,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271


On 3 Jul 2019, at 5:07 pm, Reinhard Kirchner <reinhard@brandchemistry.com.au> wrote:

Hi Heath

The client has asked to remove the services link in the main menu and replace this with "Our process" which should link directly to the process page. They have also provided the updated copy that needs to go onto the page. This was the final thing that we were waiting for and after this I can do a final handover to the client and hopefully push the site live.

I have updated the client feedback sheet with instructions and a link to the copy that needs to be updated (Row 71).
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1r_elSgRN8PqI6mKVOoja7Hl1BFdzq6kiARoCZ9ToWJA/edit#gid=1387737711

Please can you let me know if we can get it done this week so I can inform the client of when they can expect to go live with the website.

If you have any questions please do not hesitate to ask.

Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead
+61 415 413 406
Brand chemistry

brandchemistry.com.au

From: Reinhard Kirchner <reinhard@brandchemistry.com.au>
Date: Mon, Apr 1, 2019 at 3:41 PM
Subject: Re: Axiom - Progress Update
To: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Cc: Zoe Palmer <zoe@brandchemistry.com.au>, Jaime Schell <jaime@brandchemistry.com.au>


Sarah-Jane got back to me with some of the videos she wants to display on Video listing page. Please see her message (In red) below with links to each of the videos:

  1. Videos - Can you please provide us with links to all video that will need to be displayed in the listing as well as the category/filter they need to appear under:
    I'm not sure if you require the mp4 files or the vimeo links but if it is the links you require then:
  • Coleman Greig: https://vimeo.com/323985056 (Legal)
  • Nutrimetics: https://vimeo.com/323978903 (Consumer goods)
  • McGrath Foundation: https://vimeo.com/286124975 (NFP)
  • hipages: https://vimeo.com/272307871 (Professional services)
  • 1-Stop Connections: https://vimeo.com/311376741 (Technology)
  • ELMO: https://vimeo.com/291610880 (Technology)
  • Kerwin Rae: https://vimeo.com/324917163 (Professional services)
  • Axiom video so far is out of date and has to be re-done
  1. Filter categories - Please can you provide us with a list of the category filters that needs to be used for the video listing? I don't think we have enough videos to turn on the filters yet

Kind Regards,

Reinhard Kirchner
Studio Lead

Thanks.

One thing to note, we have used the current sites styling for things like h1's, h2's, p etc. These differ slightly to your XD designs, but I was hesitant to introduce new styles for some pages and not others. Keen to hear your thoughts on this though.

Thanks and speak soon!
